messages.msgSnippet: Hi Ren, I think since this is an unschooling message board, I d rather keep to that topic if you don t mind.  Thanks for offering to discuss the ADD issue
messages.messageBody:
Hi Ren,

I think since this is an unschooling message board, I'd rather keep to that
topic if you don't mind. Thanks for offering to discuss the ADD issue
though :)

Michelle H

Message: 4
Date: Wed, 22 May 2002 09:53:59 EDT
From: starsuncloud@...
Subject: Re: Digest Number 2059

In a message dated 5/22/02 7:54:31 AM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< "hunting" around the house (which is pretty hard to do living in
a subdivision in Florida!). >>


Welcome, from another Floridian.
Sounds like you had a good time with the bread making!!
I have a lot to say on ADD (or the lack of it's existence) if you're
remotely
interested.
Don't want to go there unless you're interested though.

Ren
